summary: For Aries Ascendant, Mercury transiting the 7th house shifts focus toward partnerships, contracts, and one-to-one interactions. Communication becomes central in relationships and business dealings. This phase favors negotiations, collaborations, and clarity in commitments, though over-analysis or excessive debating can strain harmony if not balanced.

sections.heading: Partnerships and One-to-One Dynamics
points: Increased interaction with partners and clients.
Relationships depend heavily on communication quality.

sections.heading: Business Deals and Negotiation
points: Favorable for contracts, agreements, and MOUs.

sections.heading: Mental Balance and Perspective
points: Over-dependence on opinions may delay action.

closing: Mercury in the 7th house for Aries Ascendant highlights the power of dialogue in partnerships. With clarity, patience, and precise communication, this transit strengthens alliances and agreements.
